title: Non-aural set, lento piano - harmonic rhythm

content.prompt: Which of the following best characterizes the harmonic rhythm in measures 1-8?

choices.label: It is faster in measures 1-4 than in measures 5-8.
It is faster in measures 5-8 than in measures 1-4.
